channel.title: Changing Item and XP rates from thieving stalls [317]
channel.description:
I need help in changing how much xp you get from a certain stall and how much money you get from them.
thanks a lot! ;D

item.title: Changing Item and XP rates from thieving stalls [317]
item.dc:creator: @rang3i_lyf3 rang3i lyf3
item.description:
@rang3i_lyf3 wrote:

ight im not sure about xp but wen u do wat usman555 said look at give item or soming if silver it should be somin silver may be soming like if (blah blah blah) then additem #### # just change the number to ex: additem 0995 100000 any other questions pm me

item.title: Changing Item and XP rates from thieving stalls [317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

You know, I may be the only one who thinks this, but I think its pretty sad that a beginner server maker cannot come to a community like MoparScape looking for a simple answer without getting a smart comment about it. It makes a person not even want to use moparscape, but thanks anyways man, sorry I troubled you, I hope answering my question wasn’t too much for you… I’ve tried what you said already, and you know what, when I put the new XPAmount in, everytime I try to steal from a stall, it logs me out.

Read full topic
